name: IT Escape Game
description: IT Escape Game is the new escape game from ajazgames. This is so freaky game, it's gonna make you get goose bums , your are stuck in an evil place , you are here to destroy the evil joker from the house, there are some scary items to be collected , make holes in the girls eyes then drop in some spiders to get some keys , be safe before if you are too afraid to of goats grudge don't not play , but if you are fearless you are gone to have fun playing IT Escape games .
